The beaten and the damned?"
He said, "Will you defeat them
Your demons, and all the non-believers
The plans that they have made?"

Ding~~~dong ding~~~dong
I can feel what you feel, but there's something can't be said.
One~~~two three~~~four
There's something you should know so we're here again.
Bro~~~their cheer~~~up
Ugh the invisible man appears again.

Central men get off from work untie their tie and hide dress shoes,
Wear the new classic vintage 70's soccer shoes,
Gather old friends and it's not bad to play soccer together,
All the friends made when we're kids are here, and their belly looks so chubby,

New soccer t shirt soccer shoes football runs out of the playground and get injured,
Feels like kids and pretending we're energized screaming on a hill,
All soccer friends stick together, gossip acting like hilarious,
Aged around 30s and shoots out of the line.

Pretty girls are all gone, my forehead is bald.
Bullshit! you still think you're 20?
Do you wanna die!? You'd have to wait if you wanted to die.

I have my ass of the loans about my car and apartment,
Still acting like you're crying, stressed out.
But I don't have money too how can I loan you to pay the loans.

Brothers don't sigh, how can I help you, baby
Shake your arms and slap your back
Cheee up, baby, give more power
Think of we were able to be like a child and didn't have to be responsible
Men's band needs you and show us your best
